marklogic.body: Who cares, let these racists chime in while black on black crime takes more scumbags Off the streets. I don't know if Zimmerman was right or wrong but if some hoodie wearing blackman comes in my home let alone white, brown or Yellow skinned intruder their seconds are all they have to live. My saigia 12 semi is judge, jury and most importantly exicutioner. My second floor apt has 1 door and no other exit so they better come in fast and stop me from making their bodies look like swiss cheese before then they harm my son or I. If they touch my son hell will be a vacation compared to what I will do to them.
